R.content: since concept of democracy has always been suicidal, if there is to be a democracy to come must think life otherwise, life and the force of life [contra to Aristotle’s actuality as life?]
R.linkedContent: since concept of democracy has always been suicidal, if there is to be a democracy to come must think life otherwise, life and the force of life [contra to Aristotle’s actuality as life?]

R.content: [re: Algeria] immunize against suicide of democracy by committing the suicide (value of this strategy can neither be confirmed nor refuted)
R.linkedContent: [re: Algeria] immunize against suicide of democracy by committing the suicide (value of this strategy can neither be confirmed nor refuted)

R.content: autoimmunity: a murder that becomes suicide, a suicide that becomes murder
R.linkedContent: autoimmunity: a murder that becomes suicide, a suicide that becomes murder

R.content: autoimmunity is suicidal while robbing suicide itself of its meaning and supposed integrity
R.linkedContent: autoimmunity is suicidal while robbing suicide itself of its meaning and supposed integrity

FWT.content: Europe is the most beautiful example of auto-immunity, and allegory, because w/ Europe we see auto-immunity as survival, invincibility as auto-immunity: immense tragedy of a beautiful suicide
FWT.linkedContent: Europe is the most beautiful example of auto-immunity, and allegory, because w/ Europe we see auto-immunity as survival, invincibility as auto-immunity: immense tragedy of a beautiful suicide

DS.content: perfect crime (mimed doubly), orgasm, heights of jouissance > leave no trace, (Bataille's laughing at dying, dying of laughter), “supreme spasm” [Wolf Man] > hymen
DS.linkedContent: perfect crime (mimed doubly), orgasm, heights of jouissance > leave no trace, (Bataille's laughing at dying, dying of laughter), “supreme spasm” [Wolf Man] > hymen

SW.content: letting other live: absolute suicide, no trace, not even the seal of a break
SW.linkedContent: letting other live: absolute suicide, no trace, not even the seal of a break

SW.content: not even leave them my ashes
SW.linkedContent: not even leave them my ashes

SW.content: no longer be oneself or have oneself (s’être ou s’avoir) > truth w/out truth looking for me at end of world
SW.linkedContent: no longer be oneself or have oneself (s’être ou s’avoir) > truth w/out truth looking for me at end of world

SW.content: blessing of one who leaves w/out leaving an address
SW.linkedContent: blessing of one who leaves w/out leaving an address

DPi.content: Blanchot’s right to death: right to give it, giving it to oneself (en se la donnant), inflicting DP; right to accede to death (not natural) by exceeding natural life > both the right that gives birth to literature and the law that gives birth to the law itself: literature thinks this right of/to right
DPi.linkedContent: Blanchot’s right to death: right to give it, giving it to oneself (en se la donnant), inflicting DP; right to accede to death (not natural) by exceeding natural life > both the right that gives birth to literature and the law that gives birth to the law itself: literature thinks this right of/to right

DPi.content: condemned to death: know the date, quasi-suicidal mastery of death, criminals who do everything to give themselves this death (se donner cette mort) > phantasm of omnipotence over their own death
DPi.linkedContent: condemned to death: know the date, quasi-suicidal mastery of death, criminals who do everything to give themselves this death (se donner cette mort) > phantasm of omnipotence over their own death

DPi.content: coinciding w/ deconstruction of DP, the possibility of a suicide that is neither self-murder nor self-inflicted
DPi.linkedContent: coinciding w/ deconstruction of DP, the possibility of a suicide that is neither self-murder nor self-inflicted

DPi.content: alleged mastery over limit btwn life/death organizes every calculation btwn dead & living, presupposes ability of giving death, mastering instant of death; calculable credit we grant to “death” indexed to set of presuppositions in which “capital punishment” finds a place of inscription where it’s indissociable from murder & suicide; if we can’t master instant of death, one could neither talk of murder, suicide, DP…
DPi.linkedContent: alleged mastery over limit btwn life/death organizes every calculation btwn dead & living, presupposes ability of giving death, mastering instant of death; calculable credit we grant to “death” indexed to set of presuppositions in which “capital punishment” finds a place of inscription where it’s indissociable from murder & suicide; if we can’t master instant of death, one could neither talk of murder, suicide, DP…

DPi.content: can’t share death, must die one by one, if it were possible for 2 people to seek DP together this would be more sacred than marriage
DPi.linkedContent: can’t share death, must die one by one, if it were possible for 2 people to seek DP together this would be more sacred than marriage

DPi.content: what if no DP would frustrate society’s promise to kill you, to let you kill yourself > a diabolical proposition & formidable
DPi.linkedContent: what if no DP would frustrate society’s promise to kill you, to let you kill yourself > a diabolical proposition & formidable

DPi.content: to run toward DP, to run toward suicide, to want to have done w/ the other > out of excess hatred/love
DPi.linkedContent: to run toward DP, to run toward suicide, to want to have done w/ the other > out of excess hatred/love

REST.content: “to suicide” someone —make him come back (le faire revenir) as a ghost (fantôme) or make him stay (le faire rester) as a ghost, où il est, en somme assez bien enterré, ne disposant plus que de ses pas? > pas de revenant, pas de nom [don’t let the dead bury the dead]
REST.linkedContent: “to suicide” someone —make him come back (le faire revenir) as a ghost (fantôme) or make him stay (le faire rester) as a ghost, où il est, en somme assez bien enterré, ne disposant plus que de ses pas? > pas de revenant, pas de nom [don’t let the dead bury the dead]

PSSS.content: btwn killing/suicide: difference infinite & null [cf. DPi p. 249]

C.content: feu (sur) le paradigme [TN. fire on the paradigm, late paradigm], fuit, il-fût > suicide paradigm, retrac(t)ing by blowing itself up
C.linkedContent: feu (sur) le paradigme [TN. fire on the paradigm, late paradigm], fuit, il-fût > suicide paradigm, retrac(t)ing by blowing itself up

TN.content: Novalis: only authentic philosophical act is suicide > first kiss and suicide [?]
TN.linkedContent: Novalis: only authentic philosophical act is suicide > first kiss and suicide [?]

CIR.content: writing w/out believing in one’s survival, in the inheritance of the last will, writing for the present, a made present, like SA wants to make truth: I don’t take my life, je me donne ici la mort
CIR.linkedContent: writing w/out believing in one’s survival, in the inheritance of the last will, writing for the present, a made present, like SA wants to make truth: I don’t take my life, je me donne ici la mort

EU.content: in 1644, Courcelle’s Latin translation of Discourse of Method doesn’t include Descartes’ “I am speaking French” > when “original” speaks its language by speaking of its language, it prepares a suicide by translation, suicide by fire: almost w/out remainder [tells us about idiomaticity in general]
EU.linkedContent: in 1644, Courcelle’s Latin translation of Discourse of Method doesn’t include Descartes’ “I am speaking French” > when “original” speaks its language by speaking of its language, it prepares a suicide by translation, suicide by fire: almost w/out remainder [tells us about idiomaticity in general]

SPEC.content: [Freud’s death drive] autoteleguiding, suicide deferred, wishes to sound its own glas, wishes the impossible > most driven drive is drive of the proper, reappropriate oneself
SPEC.linkedContent: [Freud’s death drive] autoteleguiding, suicide deferred, wishes to sound its own glas, wishes the impossible > most driven drive is drive of the proper, reappropriate oneself
